painPoints: Sensor stops tracking for half a second frequently
Issue persists even at 8000hz polling rate
Problem occurs in both wireless and wired modes
Defective dongle in first unit requiring return
High price point ($150) despite serious defects
improvementSuggestions: Enhance quality control for dongles before shipping

painPoints: Price not justified by performance benefits
Similar performance achievable with cheaper alternatives
improvementSuggestions: Adjust pricing strategy to improve competitiveness
Add unique features that justify premium pricing
